pull.title: lcov: filter depends from coverage reports
pull.body: If you build the binaries with the `depends` folder and then generate coverage reports with `make cov`, `depends` will be included in the coverage reports. Coverage of the dependencies are not that interesting and should be filtered.

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.

comments.body: style-nit: Could make this multiline to avoid very long lines?
Right, usually the one-per-line approach is preferred for these, not only because long lines are inconvenient but also as it makes it easier to review as well as rebase changes

Could you add a commit to also exclude lib64, please. This shows up when compiling with clang-8 for example:

https://pbs.twimg.com/media/ELKJFh3XsAAM6mJ?format=png&name=medium
Done! Guessing that I should squash the commits too?
I think it's fine to have these as separate commits, they're not really related
Sounds good, will keep it as is! üëå
